author: doogie
msg: Add some missed dependencies; these were not shown as required, because
javac was only showing 100 errors.  Also, note that several of the
catalina/tomcat deps are not enabled in the catalina component, as they
are only needed at runtime.  Once everything is ported to maven, those
deps will need to be enabled.

author: doogie
msg: Increase the reported error count for javac from 100 to 10000.  This
will help to track down dependency problems, which were getting cut-off
with the low error count value.
